text: Fileset and patternset are case sensitive under Windows. for example, *.DLL is different from *.dll. Under Windows, ant could be considered as non viable in this context.

creator: bodewig@apache.org

text:
I suggest we add a non-required attribute, say, casesensitive, to fileset which 
defaults to true.  If this is overridden by the user and set to false, 
DirectoryScanner would ignore case of the file/directory names.

I will submit a patch soon.  

Thanks,
Magesh
creator: umagesh@rediffmail.com
umagesh@rediffmail.com
text:

[PATCH] casesensitive attribute added to fileset.  This defaults to true and is not a required attribute.  Modified Java files include FileSet, FileScanner and DirectoryScanner.
